name: The Queen's Flower
description:
"The Queen's Flower" is an action adventure game prototype for "The Radiant Amethyst."

The Story is set 15 years before the events that will transpire in "The Radiant Amethyst." Play as the queen, Alexandria Valkrose, and explore the kingdom in search for the rare magenta kalachuchi flower, referred to as "The Queen's Flower."
